data.title: Contact Us

data.text:
There are many ways you can get in touch with us.

On this page you will find email contact details for:

You can also use the contact form at the top of this page.

Al-Hilal News

Editorial: [email protected]

General enquiries: [email protected]

Our registered office address is 18 Mulberry Avenue, Widnes, WA8 0WN.

Our London address for correspondence is 28 Ormiston Grove, London, W12 0JT.

For corporate queries, you can get in touch with members of our leadership team at the following addresses:

Co-Founder & Executive Chairman: [email protected]

Co-Founder & CEO: [email protected]

Chief Operating Officer: [email protected]

You can find further details about our senior team and how to contact them on the corporate website’s leadership page.

Feedback, Corrections and Compliance

To give feedback about our content, request corrections, or for matters regarding legal compliance, please contact either [email protected] or [email protected].

Advertising and PROP

If you’d like to enquire about advertising opportunities, or about our publisher advertising platform PROP, you can contact:

Head of Programmatic: [email protected]

Head of Client Success Management: [email protected]
